did.unittitle: Association of Sunday School Teachers of Philadelphia records

bioghist.p: Originally called the Association of Male Sunday School Teachers of Philadelphia, the object of the Association of Sunday School Teachers of Philadelphia was to cultivate union among teachers, to devise and recommend the best methods for conducting Sunday schools, and for extending their influence and efficiency.

scopecontent.p: This collection includes minutes of monthly meetings of the Association of Male Sunday School Teachers of Philadelphia, 1824-1831. Minutes record routine business and list topics of discussion and reports from visitations. Includes constitution and by-laws, a list of member churches and superintendents of their Sunday schools, and a list of the discussion questions addressed during the Association's meetings. Questions relate to the structuring of classes, increasing attendance and interest in Sunday schools, and some general matters of curriculum.
